solution_line_template: He has {apples} apples and {bananas} bananas, so he has {apples} + {bananas} = <<{apples}+{bananas}={current_fruit}>>{current_fruit} pieces of fruit.
He needs to buy {total_desired_fruit} fruit - {current_fruit} fruit = <<{total_desired_fruit}-{current_fruit}={oranges_needed}>>{oranges_needed} oranges.
